Class.name: Custom.AUXX.Report.ZEN.Composite.ReportHeader
Class.Description:
This composite displays a single value
Add to report as <auxx:ReportHeader .../>

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

Property.name: reporttitle
Property.Description: XPath Expression to report title data

Property.name: class
Property.Description: Use this attribute to replace the default class for the composite's table. Default class is auxxreporttitle
